page.title: 18Education
page.content: One study on air led to the making of tissue paper hot air balloons which travelled several miles with cotton wool and methylated spirit propulsion. This was followed by a helium balloon race . One balloon was found by a teacher from a small village school in Linconshire ,and now there is a twinning between the two schools. The upper juniors play a variety of instruments including clarinet and violin,and there is a small brass band. They play netball, cricket rounders and football against other schools in the area,and there are swimming competitions.
